import { Component } from "@angular/core"; import { Cart } from "src/app/domain/cart.model"; @Component({ selector: "app-cart-detail", templateUrl: "./cart-detail.component.html", styleUrls: ["./cart-detail.component.css"], }) export class CartDetailComponent { constructor(public cart: Cart) {} }
